Summary A dynamic IT management professional with fifteen years of experience in quality assurance and project management. Successful track record of defining and implementing test methodologies with expertise in identifying and implementing solutions, providing cost reduction and control and offering strong client service. Experience with key software development life-cycle methodologies, such as: Agile, Waterfall, Spiral & Bottom Up. My ability to consistently exceed project objectives and maintain product quality has led to my career success. I am looking to utilize my analytical, leadership, team building and negotiation skills with a company that values product quality.
